commit message:

Merge pull request #369 from SweetLion/patch-2

Added F-Droid Badge

fix state info error of downloading list

change downloading state message from 'upload waiting' to 'download waiting'

fix crash when open .kdb and .kdbx files

1. All MIME types received from outside Android
(such as user input, or external sources like Bluetooth, NFC, or the Internet)
should be normalized before they are used to create an Intent.
2. MIME type and Uri scheme matching in the Android framework is case-sensitive, unlike the formal RFC definitions.
As a result, you should always write these elements with lower case letters,
or use normalizeMimeType(String) or normalizeScheme() or setDataAndTypeAndNormalize(Uri, String)
to ensure that they are converted to lower case.
3. use setDataAndTypeAndNormalize instead of setDataAndType
support sort files in descending order

Fix bug in certificate validation

Matches the server host name without port information against the
retrieved certificate. See
https://forum.seafile-server.org/t/bug-in-seafile-android-app-1-7-1/1911/3
use the same flag to mark a transfer task
restart tasks in an elegant way
support multi choice via action mode
update selected items count on action mode title

highlight selected items in action mode

In order to highlight the selected items,
* Add this to the XML for individual ListView items: android:background='?android:attr/activatedBackgroundIndicator'
* call 'setItemChecked(position, checked)' method (on the ListView instance) for that item in the list (incorrect)
Note: The call to setItemChecked will result in StackOverflowError,
because calling setItemChecked in onItemCheckedStateChanged will be just calling each other infinitely
see http://stackoverflow.com/a/9268397/3962551
